articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of An Kyong Ho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of An Kyong Ho
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a wreath to the bier of An Kyong Ho, winner of Order of Kim Il Sung and National Reunification Prize and former director of the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea, on Jan. 5, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: WPK Central Committee Issues Order to Conduct First H-Bomb Test
articles.content:
WPK Central Committee Issues Order to Conduct First H-Bomb Test
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, issued an order to conduct the first H-bomb test of Juche Korea on December 15, Juche 104 (2015) on behalf of the Workers' Party of Korea and then signed the final written order on Jan. 3, Juche 105 (2016).
					 The DPRK government issues a statement on the first H-bomb test of Juche Korea conducted under the strategic resolve of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: DPRK Proves Successful in H-bomb Test
articles.content:
DPRK Proves Successful in H-bomb Test
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government issued the following statement Wednesday:
					 There took place a world startling event to be specially recorded in the national history spanning 5,000 years in the exciting period when all service personnel and people of the DPRK are making a giant stride, performing eye-catching miracles and exploits day by day after turning out as one in the all-out charge to bring earlier the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche, true to the militant appeal of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 The first H-bomb test was successfully conducted in the DPRK at 10:00 on Wednesday, Juche 105 (2016), pursuant to the strategic determination of the WPK.
					
					 Through the test conducted with indigenous wisdom, technology and efforts the DPRK fully proved that the technological specifications of the newly developed H-bomb for the purpose of test were accurate and scientifically verified the power of smaller H-bomb.
					
					 It was confirmed that the H-bomb test conducted in a safe and perfect manner had no adverse impact on the ecological environment.
					
					 The test means a higher stage of the DPRK's development of nuclear force.
					
					 By succeeding in the H-bomb test in the most perfect manner to be specially recorded in history the DPRK proudly joined the advanced ranks of nuclear weapons states possessed of even H-bomb and the Korean people came to demonstrate the spirit of the dignified nation equipped with the most powerful  nuclear deterrent.
					
					 This test is a measure for self-defence the DPRK has taken to firmly protect the sovereignty of the country and the vital right of the nation from the ever-growing nuclear threat and blackmail by the U.S.-led hostile forces and to reliably safeguard the peace on the Korean Peninsula and regional security.
					
					 Since the appearance of the word hostility in the world there has been no precedent of such deep-rooted, harsh and persistent policy as the hostile policy the U.S. has pursued towards the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is a gang of cruel robbers which has worked hard to bring even a nuclear disaster to the DPRK, not content with having imposed the thrice-cursed and unheard-of political isolation, economic blockade and military pressure on it for the mere reason that it has differing ideology and social system and refuses to yield to the former's ambition for aggression.
					
					 The Korean Peninsula and its vicinity are turning into the world's biggest hotspot where a nuclear war may break out since they have been constantly stormed with all nuclear strike means of the U.S. imperialist aggressor troops, including nuclear carrier strike group and nuclear strategic flying corps.
					
					 While kicking up all forms of economic sanctions and conspiratorial "human rights" racket against the DPRK with mobilization of the hostile forces, the U.S. has made desperate efforts to block its building of a thriving nation and improvement of the people's living standard and "bring down its social system".
					
					 The DPRK's access to H-bomb of justice, standing against the U.S., the chieftain of aggression watching for a chance for attack on it with huge nukes of various types, is the legitimate right of a sovereign state for self-defense and a very just step no one can slander.
					
					 Genuine peace and security cannot be achieved through humiliating solicitation or compromise at the negotiating table.
					
					 The present-day grim reality clearly proves once again the immutable truth that one's destiny should be defended by one's own efforts.
					
					 Nothing is more foolish than dropping a hunting gun before herds of ferocious wolves.
					
					 The spectacular success made by the DPRK in the H-bomb test this time is a great deed of history, a historic event of the national significance as it surely guarantees the eternal future of the nation.
					
					 The DPRK is a genuine peace-loving state which has made all efforts to protect peace on the Korean Peninsula and security in the region from the U.S. vicious nuclear war scenario.
					
					 The DPRK, a responsible nuclear weapons state, will neither be the first to use nuclear weapons nor transfer relevant means and technology under any circumstances as already declared as long as the hostile forces for aggression do not encroach upon its sovereignty.
					
					 There can neither be suspended nuclear development nor nuclear dismantlement on the part of the DPRK unless the U.S. has rolled back its vicious hostile policy toward the former.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will steadily escalate its nuclear deterrence of justice both in quality and quantity to reliably guarantee the future of the revolutionary cause of Juche for all ages.
					
					 Juche Korea will be prosperous forever as it holds fast to the great WPK's line of simultaneously pushing forward the two fronts.

articles.title: Reception Given for Art Troupe of Korean Schoolchildren in Japan
articles.content:
Reception Given for Art Troupe of Korean Schoolchildren in Japan
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Under the loving care of supreme leader Kim Jong Un a reception was given at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday for the art troupe of Korean schoolchildren in Japan who took part in the performance celebrating the New Year, Juche 105 (2016). 
					 Present there on invitation was the art troupe of Korean schoolchildren in Japan headed by Sin Kil Ung, principal of Tokyo Korean Secondary and High School.
					
					 Present there were Ri Il Hwan, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Jin Guk, director of the Agency of Overseas Korean Affairs, Kang Won Gyu, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, and officials concerned.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.
					
					 Schoolchildren in Pyongyang and members of the art troupe gave a joint performance.

articles.title: New Year Concert Given by Chongbong Band
articles.content:
New Year Concert Given by Chongbong Band
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- New Year concert given by the Chongbong Band of the Wangjaesan Art Troupe dropped its curtain on Jan. 5. Its concert started at the People's Palace of Culture on Jan. 1.
					 Among the audience were working people, youth and students in Pyongyang and foreigners staying in the DPRK.
					
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as female choruses "Our Leader Loved by People" and "Ode to the Motherland" and light music "Arirang of Prosperity".
					
					 The artistes truthfully represented the reverence for Marshal Kim Jong Un and the loyal pledge of all service personnel and people to hold him in high esteem in single mind.
					
					 Light music "Song of Big Fish Haul" and light music and song "Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass" revved up the mood of the concert.
					
					 Light music "Higher and Faster", light music and song "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu" and female chorus "Campfire, Flare Up" encouraged the working people dashing forward toward the building of a thriving nation.

articles.title: Korean Youth, Workers and Trade Union Members Meet
articles.content:
Korean Youth, Workers and Trade Union Members Meet
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Young vanguard, workers and members of trade unions held meetings at the Youth Park Open-Air Theatre and the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex on Wednesday to carry through the tasks set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 Attending them were Ri Il Hwan, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, and others.
					
					 At the meeting of young vanguard a reporter and speakers said the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un serves as a militant banner powerfully encouraging all the people and youth across the country to the drive to glorify the 7th Congress of the WPK which will constitute a historic landmark in carrying out the cause of the Juche revolution as the congress of victors and glory.
					
					 They called upon all youth and students to become the first-line death-defying corps defending the leader, the corps remaining most intensely loyal to the idea and leadership of Kim Jong Un, and the best standard-bearers devotedly implementing to the end the orders and instructions of the party under any circumstances.
					
					 They also called upon all young people to adorn the 7th Congress of the WPK and the 70th anniversary of the formation of the youth league with unprecedented labor successes and fresh achievements in the youth work, full of honor and pride of being members of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's dignified nation equipped with the most powerful nuclear deterrent and thus fully demonstrate once again the dignity and might of the youth power without parallel in the world.
					
					 At the meeting of workers and members of trade unions a reporter and speakers underscored the need for all the workers and trade union members to turn out as one in the general charge for final victory in hearty response to the militant slogan "Let us usher in a golden age in building a thriving nation in this year when the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea is to be held!"
					
					 They called upon the factories and enterprises across the country to kindle the flames for collective emulation to bring about a new turn in developing the economy of the country and improving the people's living standard.
					
					 Then an outline for socialist emulation was announced.

articles.title: KPA Servicepersons Encouraged at Successful H-bomb Test
articles.content:
KPA Servicepersons Encouraged at Successful H-bomb Test
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The successful first H-bomb test has lashed all the servicepersons of the DPRK into a great joy.
					Men and officers of the Korean People's Army have termed the successful test a thrilling warning of the DPRK to the U.S-led hostile forces engaged in nuclear threat and blackmail.
					
					 The present grave reality teaches again the immovable truth that one's destiny should be defended by one's own efforts, they have stressed, saying in union that the test fully reflected the iron will of the invincible Paektusan army.
					
					 A KPA officer told KCNA: 
					
					 There is a Korean saying "Be like a tiger who has grown wings".
					
					 This saying is quite fit for our revolutionary armed forces reliably defending the nation's sovereignty and dignity, as they can now get equipped with H-bombs as well as powerful nukes.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists have steadily escalated the situation of the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war, defying the DPRK's just proposal for conclusion of a peace treaty aimed to ensure the regional and global peace.
					
					 Such impudent deeds made them face fatal results like today.
					
					 The more frantic the hostile forces get in their moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK, the stronger its nuclear deterrent will grow, bringing them to deathbed repentance.

articles.title: Successful H-bomb Test, Historic Event of Korean Nation
articles.content:
Successful H-bomb Test, Historic Event of Korean Nation
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The successful first H-bomb test greatly encourages all citizens of the DPRK who have turned out in the general offensive for the new year.
					 Kim Myong Son, head of a furnace shop at the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex, told KCNA that all the employees of the complex are full of the same mettle and passion as those they felt in the past upon receiving the news about the successful launch of the first artificial satellite and success in underground nuclear test.
					
					 We will fully display the revolutionary spirit of the heroic Korean working class this year to greet the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with increased production, he said, adding: On the basis of successes gained in completing the modernization of the UHP electric arc furnace, introducing high-temperature air-combustion technology, making a large oxygen separator and building a ferroalloy furnace and oxygen heat-based furnace, we will further increase the production of heavy rail and steel.
					
					 Ho Chun Gum, chairwoman of the management board of the Kumdae Cooperative Farm in Rangnang District, Pyongyang, said:
					
					 Now, the U.S. and other hostile forces become evermore desperate in their moves to check the DPRK people in building a thriving nation and improving the living standard and bring down the social system in the DPRK.
					
					 The reality clearly proves the truth that one's destiny should be defended by one's own efforts.
					
					 The successful H-bomb test was a measure for self-defence the DPRK took to protect its sovereignty and the vital rights of the Korean nation from the escalating nuclear threat and blackmail by the hostile forces, as part of its efforts to reliably defend the peace on the Korean Peninsula and regional security.
					
					 We, agricultural workers, will do our best to bring about a bumper crop this year with the national dignity and pride of being nationals of a nuclear weapons state.

articles.title: Coal Output Up in DPRK
articles.content:
Coal Output Up in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Coal miners in the DPRK have turned out in a drive to boost production in hearty response to supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year address.
					 In this regard, Kim Chang Sok, department director of the Ministry of Coal Industry, told KCNA:
					
					 In his New Year address the dear respected Kim Jong Un said that the sector of coal-mining industry should raise the fierce flames of an upsurge in production to ensure enough supply of coal for the thermal power stations and several sectors of the national economy.
					
					 Encouraged by his deep trust, all colliers across the country are now replete with a strong will to greet the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with unprecedentedly increased coal production.
					
					 In the first five days of the year, about 5 000 more tons of coal were produced throughout the country than the same period of last year.
					
					 The Sunchon Area Youth Coal-mining Complex has carried out daily assignment at 102 percent.
					
					 The Tokchon Area Coal-mining Complex topped its daily quota two percent by introducing rational blasting methods while the Kaechon Area Coal-mining Complex increased its production considerably.
					
					 Collieries in Tukjang, Kangdong and Pukchang areas raised the tunneling speed 1.2 times and those in Hamnam (South Hamgyong Province) area carried out their daily quota at 124 percent.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Paving Way for Improving Relations between North and South of Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Paving Way for Improving Relations between North and South of Korea
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The north and the south of Korea should pave a broad avenue to improving their relations on the basis of the agreements common to the nation in conformity with the will, wishes and interests of all Koreans, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is possible to pave the way for improving the relations between the north and the south and a broad avenue to independent reunification when the north and the south respect and sincerely implement the three principles of national reunification, the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration which comprehensively reflect the general will of the nation and the validity and vitality of which have been proved in practice. 
					
					 How to approach the agreements common to the nation serve as an important yardstick for judging whether one wants the improved relations between the north and the south or not.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations can hardly be improved by unilateral efforts and dialogue and cooperation between the north and the south would have been unthinkable without the implementation of the agreements common to the nation.
					
					 The DPRK remains unchanged in its stand to set store by the reunification programmes common to the nation and turn without fail the inter-Korean relations of distrust and confrontation into those of reconciliation and unity on their basis. 
					
					 The DPRK will have an open-minded discussion on the reunification issue, the national issue, with anyone who is truly desirous of national reconciliation and unity, peace and reunification.
					
					 But, the DPRK will never pardon the treacherous attempt to disregard the agreements common to the nation and bring down the foundation of inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on DPRK's Will to Develop External Relations on Principle of Respect for Sovereignty
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on DPRK's Will to Develop External Relations on Principle of Respect for Sovereignty
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article clarifies that it is the unshakable will of the DPRK government to develop the external relations on the principle of independence.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Developing the friendly and cooperative relations on the principle of respect for sovereignty provides a sure guarantee for meeting the intrinsic requirements of each country and nation.
					
					 There are big and small countries and developed and less developed countries in the world. But there can be no superior and inferior countries and those dictating others and those obliged to get instructions.
					
					 All countries of the world wish to develop, exercising their sovereignty with independence. Therefore, the relations among countries should be established and developed on the basis of respect for sovereignty. Only then is it possible to have genuine friendship and cooperation. Respect for sovereignty constitutes a fundamental stand which each country and nation should maintain in all activities and serves as a basis for promoting international friendship and cooperation.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to develop the relations of friendship and cooperation with all countries that respect the sovereignty of the DPRK and are friendly toward it.
					
					 The DPRK is willing to improve the relations and normalize them with the countries which respect its sovereignty and are friendly toward it though they had inglorious ties with it in the past.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever boost the friendly and cooperative relations with other countries on the principle of respect for sovereignty and thus make positive contributions to frustrating the imperialists' moves for aggression and war, domination and interference and preserving peace.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Calls on South Korea to Respond to Patriotic Appeal for Independent Reunification
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Calls on South Korea to Respond to Patriotic Appeal for Independent Reunification
 Pyongyang January 6 (KCNA) -- National reunification is the most pressing and vital task facing the Korean nation.
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address made a hearty appeal to usher in a new era of independent reunification by the efforts of the Korean nation.
					
					 The Korean nation has been in the pangs of national division for more than 70 years and exposed to the danger of war in the hottest spot in the world due to the persistent ambition of outsiders for aggression and anti-reunification moves of the war-like forces within and without.
					
					 Last year when the nation greeted the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation, the anti-reunification forces in south Korea that are not desirous of national reunification and improved inter-Korean relations ran amuck to ignite a war in league with outsiders and even created a touch-and-go situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The situation which prevailed in August last year showed that even a trifling incidental conflict between the north and the south might spark a war and escalate into an all-out war.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean war maniacs conducted large-scale military exercises aimed at a nuclear war against the DPRK one after another, throwing serious obstacles in the way of improving the inter-Korean relations and rendering the situation on the peninsula extremely tense.
					
					 While stepping up the saber-rattling against the compatriots in the north in league with outside forces, the south Korean authorities went busy with solicitation diplomacy over the internal issue of the Korean nation, the issue of national reunification.
					
					 After setting the "unification under liberal democracy" as an ultimate goal of the "policy towards the north", they made frequent foreign tours to solicit help for their scenario of "unification of social systems" under the signboard of "unification diplomacy".
					
					 "International cooperation" in the confrontation with the DPRK only ended up with miserable consequences of blocking the development of inter-Korean relations and leaving the fate of the nation to the tender mercy of outside forces. 
					
					 All these facts once again taught a historical lesson that the inter-Korean relations can never improve and the nation will suffer a war disaster unless an end is put to the foreign interference in the reunification of Korea and south Korean ruling forces' acts of treachery.
					
					 Dependence on outsiders finally leads to ruin.
					
					 The south Korean ruling forces cannot shake off their disgrace as a group of traitors and anti-reunification elements and will stand cursed and denounced by all compatriots if they persistently cooperate with outsiders and pursue hostile policy against the compatriots in the north.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities have true will for national reunification, they should stop all war moves such as military drills staged with outsiders targeting the north, to begin with, and strive to create peaceful environment favorable for national reunification.
					
					 It is necessary to reject foreign interference and resolve the issues of inter-Korean relations and national reunification independently as desired by the nation.
					
					 Nobody will bring reunification to the Korean nation.
					
					 In response to the patriotic appeal of Kim Jong Un, all Koreans are required to turn out in the nationwide struggle to achieve the national reunification and adorn this year as an epochal year of ushering in a new era of independent reunification.

articles.title: Japan's Sincere Apology for Sexual Slavery Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Japan's Sincere Apology for Sexual Slavery Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea clarified on January 2 that it would further expand the campaign for demanding Japan's sincere apology for the sexual slavery.
					 The council said that the "agreement" on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army reached between south Korea and Japan on Dec. 28 last year was a humiliating outcome as it lacked Japan's sincere apology, admission of legal responsibility and reparation for the crime.
					
					 What stunned us was the fact that south Korea and Japan discussed the matter of removing the statue of a girl depicting the victim of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army standing before the Japanese embassy in Seoul, the organization deplored.
					
					 It stressed that the statue should not be pulled down but a lot of statues would be erected in south Korea and the world.
					
					 Prior to this, the organization held the 1 211th Wednesday meeting before the Japanese embassy in Seoul on Dec. 30 last year.
					
					 At the meeting speakers said that they would set up solidarity bodies for settling the issue of the sexual slavery along with civic and social organizations, lawyers, politicians and students in Asia, Europe, the U.S., etc.
					
					 They declared that they would hold Wednesday meetings before 27 statues of a girl across the country and expand the campaign.

articles.title: Tuberculosis Occurs in S. Korea
articles.content:
Tuberculosis Occurs in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Tuberculosis occurred among many pupils of a secondary school in Changwon, South Kyongsang Province of south Korea, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 Since the occurrence of the first case at the end of August last year its number has increased to more than 50. 
					
					 The number of those infected with the case is expected to steadily swell, KBS added.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Vow to Bring about Leap Forward in Movement of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Vow to Bring about Leap Forward in Movement of Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan are fully determined to bring about a leap forward and innovations in Chongryon and the movement of Koreans in Japan in hearty response to Marshal Kim Jong Un's New Year Address and New Year message.
					 Ko Tok U, chairman of the Nishi Tokyo Headquarters of Chongryon, said it would carry thorough the important tasks set forth in the letter Kim Jong Un sent on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the formation of Chongryon and in his New Year message and thus consolidate Chongryon to be powerful Juche-based overseas compatriots' organization shining thanks to the august names of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Ri Myong Gwang, chairman of the Juokoto Branch  of Tokyo Metropolis of Chongryon, noted Koreans in Japan are confident that a new heyday is sure to be ushered in the movement of Koreans in Japan along with the heyday in building a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 He vowed to more powerfully demonstrate the might of Chongryon, which had grown strong under the care of the great leaders, in the significant new year when the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea is to be held.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Highly Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Highly Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Russia and round-table talks took place in Malaysia on December 28 and 29 last year to mark the 4th anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said that the KPA has defended Korean-style socialism and displayed its invincible might, foiling the moves of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK as it is holding the great brilliant commanders in high esteem generation after generation.
					
					 The director of the Center for Asian-Pacific International Relations Studies in Khabarovsk, Russia noted that the invincible might of the KPA lies in the fact that it is armed with the spirit of wholeheartedly following its supreme commander and devotedly defending him.
					
					 The general secretary of the Malaysian Trade Unions Congress noted:
					
					 The U.S. dares not provoke the DPRK as HE Kim Jong Un has bolstered up the military capability as firm as an iron wall by enforcing the Songun politics. Had the DPRK failed to build tremendous military muscle, it would have faced the same fate as Iraq's.
					
					 I hope to see Korea reunified as early as possible and will always extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for the country's reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Nigerian Bodies
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Nigerian Bodies
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy, the Group for the Study of the Songun Politics and the Group for Self-Reliance Studies released a joint statement on January 1 supporting the part dealing with Korea's reunification in supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, in his New Year Address called for setting store by the three principles of national reunification and agreements common to the nation including the north-south declarations and for paving an avenue to improving the north-south relations on the basis of them.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean regime should not aggravate tension, pursuant to their anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK, and stop their reckless "human rights" conspiratorial racket against it.
					
					 We fully support the part dealing with national reunification in Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					
					 We are sure that the Korean people will win a fresh victory in the struggle for reunifying their country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Proposal for Korea's Reunification Supported by Beninese Bodies
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Proposal for Korea's Reunification Supported by Beninese Bodies
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on January 2 in support of the proposal made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address for achieving national reunification.
					 The statement said Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address for 2016 indicated the path to be covered by all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad to build a dignified and prosperous reunified country under the banner of By Our Nation Itself by thwarting all challenges and obstructions of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad.
					
					 It continued:
					
					 The south Korean regime should respect and honestly implement the three principles of national reunification, the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration as they comprehensively reflect the general will of all Koreans and their validity was verified in practice.
					
					 The regime should remain true to the agreement made at the last year's north-south high-level urgent contact and refrain from going against it or chilling the atmosphere of dialogue.
					
					 We fully support the proposal for Korea's reunification clarified by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.

articles.title: British Body Lauds Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
British Body Lauds Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted an article on its website on December 29 last year on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The article said that Kim Jong Un's assumption of the KPA supreme commandership was a historic event of weighty significance not only for all the Korean people but also for the world independent forces against imperialism.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The past four years represented a period in which the might of Songun Korea has been fully demonstrated.
					
					 The KPA has turned into the elite army capable of fighting any form of war desired by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 It serves as a defender of the country as well as the main force for building a thriving nation.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists provoke a war against the DPRK, oblivious of the bitter lesson drawn from their shameful defeats in the past, the KPA and people of the DPRK will resolutely wipe out the U.S.-led allied forces and win final victory.

articles.title: Ugandan Body Calls for Pulling down Concrete Wall Dividing Korea into Two Parts
articles.content:
Ugandan Body Calls for Pulling down Concrete Wall Dividing Korea into Two Parts
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement made public a statement on December 29 last year demanding the removal of the concrete wall built in the area south of the Military Demarcation Line.
					 It is 36 years since the south Korean authorities built the concrete wall at the prodding of the U.S. imperialists, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The Ugandan National Executive Committee expresses serious concern over the continued existence of the wall dividing the Korean Peninsula into two parts.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should admit that the wall is a stumbling block lying in the way of all efforts of the Korean people for country's reunification and pull it down at once.
					
					 A peace treaty should be concluded between the DPRK and the U.S. and the barrier be pulled down.
					
					 We who fully support the peaceful reunification of the Korean Peninsula demand the immediate removal of the physical barrier such as the concrete wall.

articles.title: Japanese Organizations, Civilians Accuse Government of Evading Blame for Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Japanese Organizations, Civilians Accuse Government of Evading Blame for Sexual Slavery
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Public organizations and civilians of Japan staged a protest against the authorities' attitude towards the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to the south Korean newspaper Hangyore.
					 They held a rally before the official residence of the prime minister on Jan. 4 to denounce the authorities for seeking to cover up the issue of sexual slavery.
					
					 They insisted that the girl's statue should never be removed but be erected in the national parks and other places of Japan.
					
					 The recent "agreement" cannot be recognized as it was made regardless of the people's will.
					
					 Prior to the rally, the "national action for solving the issue of comfort women for the Imperial Japanese Army," a civic body of Japan, on Dec. 29 made public a statement in protest against the "agreement" between Japan and south Korea.
					
					 The organization said that Japan's demand for removal of the girl's statue is nothing but an insult to the victims.

articles.title: U.S. Professor Slams Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army
articles.content:
U.S. Professor Slams Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army 
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- A professor of Delaware College in the U.S. contributed an article assailing the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Newsis on Jan. 2.
					 The article referred to the fact that The New York Times reported that south Korea and Japan reached an agreement on the issue of the sexual slavery and Korean women were drafted for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 It disclosed that as the survivors testified, majority of the victims of the heinous sexual slavery were girls aged 13-14.
					
					 It stressed that as long as such facts are not recorded in the textbooks used in Japan, genuine justice for the victims can not be achieved.

articles.title: CC de PTC ordena primera prueba de bomba de hidrogeno
articles.content:
CC de PTC ordena primera prueba de bomba de hidrogeno
Pyongyang, 6 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dio el 15 de diciembre del 104 (2015) de la Era Juche en representacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea la orden de realizar la primera prueba de bomba de hidrogeno de la Corea del Juche, y firmo el 3 de enero del 105 (2016) de la Era Juche la orden escrita final. 
					Se publica la declaracion del gobierno de la RPDC sobre la primera prueba de bomba de hidrogeno de la Corea del Juche, realizada segun la decision estrategica del PTC.

articles.title: Declaracion de gobierno de RPDC sobre prueba exitosa de bomba H
articles.content:
Declaracion de gobierno de RPDC sobre prueba exitosa de bomba H
Pyongyang, 6 de enero (ACNC) -- El gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 6 la siguiente declaracion.
					Ahora, todos los militares y civiles coreanos logran cada dia el gran avance con los milagros deslumbrantes y proezas al movilizarse con audacia en la ofensiva general para adelantar la victoria final de la causa de la revolucion del Juche apoyando de todo corazon el llamamiento combativo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					 En este tiempo conmovedor ocurrio el gran acontecimiento que se registrara especialmente en la historia nacional de 5 mil anos estremeciendo esta tierra.
					
					 Segun la decision estrategica del PTC tuvo lugar con exito la primera prueba de la bomba de hidrogeno de Corea del Juche a las 10:00 del dia 6 de enero del 105 (2016) de la Era Juche.
					
					 A traves de la presente prueba basada totalmente en nuestra sabiduria, nuestra tecnica y nuestras fuerzas, comprobamos que son exactos los datos tecnicos de la recien desarrollada bomba H para el ensayo y dilucidamos en lo cientifico el poderio de la bomba H minimizada.
					
					 Se verifico que el presente ensayo realizado segura y perfectamente, no ejercio cualquiera influencia negativa al medioambiente ecologico del contorno. 
					
					La reciente prueba deviene la etapa mas alta del desarrollo de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC. 
					
					Gracias a este exito mas perfecto a ser registrado especialmente en la historia, la RPDC entra a la primera linea de los paises poseedores de armas nucleares, que cuentan con bombas de hidrogeno, y el pueblo coreano exalta el impetu de de la nacion orgullosa que posee el mas poderoso disuasivo nuclear.  
					
					El presente ensayo deviene la medida autodefensiva para defender estrictamente la soberania del pais y el derecho a la subsistencia de la nacion desde las cada dia mas crecientes amenazas y chantajes nucleares de las fuerzas hostiles encabezadas por EE.UU. y asegurar mas fidedignamente la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la estabilidad regional. 
					
					Despues de la aparicion de la palabra "hostilidad" en este mundo, no hubo otra como la tan arraigada, extremada y tenaz del imperio la RPDC. 
					
					EE.UU. es la horda de gangsteres crueles, que insatisfecha con ejecutar el aislamiento politico, el bloqueo economico y la presion militar sin precedentes, hace esfuerzos desesperados por acarrear hasta la catastrofe nuclear a la RPDC que tiene la ideologia y el regimen diferentes y no se obedece a su codicia de agresion.
					
					Se convierte en la zona mas candente del mundo y punto de estallido de la guerra nuclear la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno donde se introducen sucesivamente el colectivo de ataque de portaaviones nucleares, la aviacion estrategica nuclear y otros medios de ataque nuclear de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas. 
					
					EE.UU. hace esfuerzos desesperados por impedir la construccion de un Estado prospero y la mejora de la vida del pueblo de la RPDC y lograr el "derrumbamiento del regimen norcoreano" instigando a las fuerzas hostiles a la sancion economica de diferente formas y la intrigante campana de "DDHH" contra la RPDC. 
					
					La posesion de la bomba de hidrogeno de la RPDC, que se enfrenta con EE.UU., caudillo de agresion que acecha la oportunidad de ataque a esta, deviene el legitimo derecho a la autodefensa de un Estado soberano y una justa medida incensurable para nadie. 
					
					La paz y la seguridad verdaderas no se logran por la solicitud avasallante ni por el dialogo conciliativo. 
					
					La severa realidad de hoy vuelve a comprobar mas evidentemente que uno debe defender su destino solo con su propia fuerza.
					
					Sera una tonteria abandonar la escopeta de caza ante la horda de lobos que arremeten furiosamente.
					
					El gran exito deslumbrante logrado por la RPDC en la prueba de la bomba de hidrogeno constituye un gran acontecimiento de la historia nacional, que garantiza fidedignamente el eterno futuro la nacion coreana. 
					
					La RPDC es el verdadero Estado amante de la paz que hace todos sus esfuerzos por frustrar el malsano intento de la guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y asegurar la paz en la Peninsula Coreana y la seguridad de la region.
					
					 Como ya fue declarado, la RPDC, responsable pais poseedor de las armas nucleares, no sera primero en usar las armas nucleares, ni trasladara en cualquier caso los medios y las tecnicas relativos mientras que las fuerzas hostiles agresivas no violen nuestra soberania.
					
					 Si no se interrumpe la atroz politica hostil de EE.UU. contra la RPDC, no habra jamas el cese del desarrollo nuclear o la renuncia nuclear de la RPDC.
					
					  El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea fortaleceran constantemente en lo cuantitativo nuestro justo disuasivo nuclear que garantiza confiablemente el eterno futuro de la causa de la revolucion del Juche.
					
					  Sera prospera para siempre la Corea del Juche que avanza enarbolando la linea del desarrollo paralelo del PTC.

articles.title: Ofrecida funcion de Banda Chongbong de Conjunto Artistico Wangjaesan
articles.content:
Ofrecida funcion de Banda Chongbong de Conjunto Artistico Wangjaesan
Pyongyang, 6 de enero (ACNC) -- Quedo clausurado el dia 5 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la funcion de la Banda Chongbong del Conjunto Artistico Wangjaesan iniciada desde el dia primero de este mes con motivo del Ano Nuevo 105 (2016) de la Era Juche.
					La disfrutaron los trabajadores de distintos estratos, jovenes y estudiantes en esta capital y los huespedes extranjeros quienes permanecen en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					En la escena se pusieron el coro femenino "Nuestro dirigente adorado por el pueblo", "Himno a la Patria", la musica ligera "Arirang de la prosperidad", la musica ligera para el acordeon cromatico "Mi patria llena de esperanzas", la musica ligera y cancion "Victoria continua generacion tras generacion" y otras piezas.
					
					Los ejecutantes describieron ardientemente el sentimiento de veneracion hacia el Mariscal Kim Jong Un y el alma de fidelidad de todos los militares y civiles de apoyarlo de todo corazon.
					
					El ambiente de funcion se llego a climax con la musica ligera "Cancion de abundante pesca en el mar", la musica ligera y cancion "Mar de manzanas al pie del monte Chol" que describen la alegria del pueblo de que desborda entre el aroma del mar socialista y de frutas.
					
					La musica ligera "Mas alto y mas rapido", la musica ligera y cancion "Brillaran tanto la patria como la juventud" y "Iremos al monte Paektu" hicieron redoblar el entusiasmo de salto a los trabajadores de distintos estratos que avanzan con toda velocidad hacia el cima del Estado prospero.

articles.title: ACNC llama a responder al llamamiento patriotico de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
ACNC llama a responder al llamamiento patriotico de Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, 6 de enero (ACNC) -- La reunificacion de la patria es la tarea mas urgente y vital para la nacion coreana. 
					En el mensaje del Ano Nuevo el Mariscal Kim Jong Un llamo a abrir nueva era de reunificacion independiente con las fuerzas unidas de la nacion. 
					
					Debido a la persistente ambicion de agresion de las fuerzas extranjeras y las maniobras anti-reunificacion de las fuerzas belicistas interiores y exteriores del pais, la nacion coreana sufre durante mas de 70 anos la tragedia de division nacional y vive en medio de la amenaza de guerra en la zona mas candente del mundo. 
					
					El ano pasado en que se cumplio el aniversario 70 de la liberacion de Corea las fuerzas opositoras a la reunificacion de la patria y a la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas se entregaron a las maniobras belicas en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras acarreando a la Peninsula Coreana la crisis a punto de beligerancia. 
					
					El caso de agosto pasado demostro que hasta un minimo accidente eventual puede extenderse a la guerra total.
					
					Los incesantes ejercicios de guerra nuclear de gran envergadura, librados en el suelo surcoreano por EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, pusieron graves obstaculos en las relaciones intercoreanas y agravaron extremadamente la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas recurrieron a las maniobras belicas contra la parte connacional en confabulacion con las fuerzas extranjeras y les solicitaron la solucion del problema nacional y el de reunificacion. 
					
					Al presentar la "unificacion bajo el sistema liberal y democratico" como meta final de la "politica sobre el Norte" y bajo el cartel de la "diplomacia de unificacion", mendigaron a las fuerzas extranjeras apoyar su artimana de "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes". 
					
					La "colaboracion internacional" anti-RPDC impidio el desarrollo de los vinculos Norte-Sur y entrego el destino de la nacion como objeto de engano a las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					Tales hechos ensenan de nuevo la siguiente leccion de la historia: mientras no se eliminen la intervencion de las fuerzas extranjeras en el problema de la reunificacion de la patria y los actos vendepatrias y traidores de los gobernantes surcoreanos, las relaciones intercoreanas no se mejoraran nunca y la nacion coreana sufrira los desastres de la guerra. 
					
					La dependencia de las fuerzas extranjeras trae el arruinamiento del pais. 
					
					Si los gobernantes surcoreanos no abandonan la politica fratricida en colaboracion con las fuerzas extranjeras, no pueden liberarse nunca de la deshonra de la horda de traidores a la nacion y fuerzas anti-reunificacion, sino seran repudiados y rechazados por toda la nacion. 
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas tienen de veras la voluntad de reunificar la patria, deben parar primero todas las acciones de guerra incluso los ejercicios belicos anti-RPDC y esforzarse por crear el ambiente pacifico favorable a la reintegracion territorial de la patria. 
					
					Hay que rechazar la intervencion de las fuerzas extranjeras y resolver el problema de las relaciones intercoreanas y el de reunificacion de la patria conforme a la aspiracion y demanda de la nacion coreana. 
					
					Nadie puede regalar la reunificacion a la nacion coreana. 
					
					En respuesta al llamamiento patriotico del Mariscal, todos los integrantes de la nacion coreana deben levantarse como un solo hombre en el movimiento pannacional para la reunificacion de la patria y hacer del presente un ano de gran viraje para abrir nueva era de reunificacion independiente.
